description: Object storage plug-in license: Apache license Version 2.0. Set to 'true' to accept the license and install the plugin
displayname: Object Storage Plug-in License: Apache License Version 2.0
name: license

description: Supported providers are 'IBM', 'AWS' and 'Wasabi'. For providers other than IBM, you must explicitly provide 'Object Storage Service Endpoint'
name: s3provider

description: Enter the region where your object storage is located. For IBM COS regions, see https://ibm.biz/cos-storage-classes. For Wasabi, see https://ibm.biz/wasabi-endpoints. For AWS, see https://ibm.biz/aws-endpoints.
name: cos-storageclass

description: Object storage service endpoint. Required when 'Object Storage Service Provider' is not set. Preference is given to 'Object Storage Service Provider' when both are set. For IBM COS, see to https://ibm.biz/cos-endpoints. For Wasabi, see https://ibm.biz/wasabi-endpoints. For AWS, see https://ibm.biz/aws-endpoints.
name: cos-endpoint
